chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
server: nid
clients: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (server \notin clients)
Huniq: is_true (uniq clients)
the_tag: nat
server_recv_wf: forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool

Goal:
r_step_coh_t server_recv_wf the_tag rs_step

Premises:
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
uniq : seq ?T -> bool where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat server_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- eqType]
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
Notation coh := LockCoh
rs_step = fun (this from : nid) (m : seq nat) (d : dstatelet) (pf : coh d) => fun=> (if this == server then let s := getSt_server pf in st :-> server_recv_step s from the_tag m else getLocal this d) : receive_step_t coh Expanded type for implicit arguments rs_step : forall this : nid, nid -> seq nat -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> this \in (fun=> [eta nodes]) d -> heap Arguments rs_step [this] _ _ [d]
nid = nat : Set
Record TaggedMessage : Set := TMsg { tag : nat; tms_cont : seq nat } Arguments TMsg _%nat_scope _%seq_scope
r_step_coh_t : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) -> nat -> Transitions.receive_step_t coh -> Prop
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Notation seq := list
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
eqP : reflect (?x = ?y) (?x == ?y) where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat server_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- eqType] ?x : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat server_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Equality.sort ?T] ?y : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat server_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Equality.sort ?T]
mem : ?pT -> mem_pred ?T where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat server_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Type] ?pT : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat server_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- predType ?T]
Mem : ?pT -> Mem_Pred ?T where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat server_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Type] ?pT : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat server_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- PredType ?T]
Protocols.snd_tags : seq (send_trans ?coh) -> seq nat where ?nodes : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat server_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- dstatelet -> pred nid] ?coh : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat server_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- cohpred ?nodes]
Protocols.rcv_tags : seq (receive_trans ?coh) -> seq nat where ?nodes : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat server_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- dstatelet -> pred nid] ?coh : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat server_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- cohpred ?nodes]
dyn_tp : {x : ?A & ?P x} -> ?A where ?A : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat server_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Type] ?P : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat server_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- ?A -> Type]
dyn_val : forall x : {x : ?A & ?P x}, ?P (projT1 x) where ?A : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat server_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Type] ?P : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat server_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- ?A -> Type]
Unit : ?cT where ?cT : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat server_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- pcm]
valid : ?cT -> bool where ?cT : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat server_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- pcm]
rot : nat -> seq ?T -> seq ?T where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat server_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Type]
cat : seq ?T -> seq ?T -> seq ?T where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat server_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Type]
PCM.join : ?cT -> ?cT -> ?cT where ?cT : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat server_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- pcm]
arc : seq ?T -> ?T -> ?T -> seq ?T where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat server_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- eqType]
eq_op : rel ?T where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat server_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- eqType]
in_mem : ?T -> mem_pred ?T -> bool where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat server_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Type]
pred_of_seq : seq_eqclass ?T -> {pred ?T} where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat server_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- eqType]
ssrbool.SimplPred : pred ?T -> simpl_pred ?T where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat server_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Type]
eq_mem : mem_pred ?T -> mem_pred ?T -> Prop where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat server_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Type]
cast : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A B : ?C), A = B -> interp B -> interp A where ?C : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat server_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Type]
dyn : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A : ?C), interp A -> {x : ?C & interp x} where ?C : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat server_recv_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool |- Type]
msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
Transitions.r_step_coh_t : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) -> nat -> Transitions.receive_step_t coh -> Prop
ReceiveTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_rcv : nat) (msg_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) (receive_step : Transitions.receive_step_t coh), Transitions.r_step_coh_t msg_wf t_rcv receive_step -> Transitions.receive_trans coh
Transitions.ReceiveTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_rcv : nat) (msg_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) (receive_step : Transitions.receive_step_t coh), Transitions.r_step_coh_t msg_wf t_rcv receive_step -> Transitions.receive_trans coh
Record protocol : Type := Protocol { nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid; plab : Ordered.sort Label; coh : cohpred nodes; snd_trans : seq (send_trans coh); rcv_trans : seq (receive_trans coh); snd_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.snd_tags snd_trans)); rcv_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags rcv_trans)) } Arguments Protocols.Protocol [nodes]%function_scope _ [coh] [snd_trans rcv_trans]%seq_scope
server_send_safe_coh : forall (prec : server_state -> nid -> seq nid -> Prop) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), server_send_safe prec this to d m -> coh d
Record receive_trans (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) : Type := ReceiveTrans { t_rcv : nat; msg_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool; receive_step : Transitions.receive_step_t coh; r_step_coh : Transitions.r_step_coh_t msg_wf t_rcv receive_step } Arguments Transitions.receive_trans [nodes]%function_scope Arguments Transitions.ReceiveTrans [nodes]%function_scope [coh] [t_rcv]%nat_scope [msg_wf]%function_scope [receive_step]
Transitions.send_step_t = fun send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop => forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg -> option heap : (nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop) -> Type Arguments Transitions.send_step_t _%function_scope
CohPredMixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
Transitions.send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
server_step : forall (prec : server_state -> nid -> seq nid -> Prop) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), server_send_safe prec this to d msg -> option heapUMC
server_send_safe = fun (prec : server_state -> nid -> seq nid -> Prop) (this n : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat) => HServ this n /\ (exists C : coh d, prec (getSt_server C) n msg) : (server_state -> nid -> seq nid -> Prop) -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop Arguments server_send_safe _%function_scope _ _ _ _%seq_scope
server_send_safe_in : forall (prec : server_state -> nid -> seq nid -> Prop) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), server_send_safe prec this to d m -> this \in nodes /\ to \in nodes
s_step_coh_t : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> nat -> forall send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop, Transitions.send_step_t send_safe -> Prop
Transitions.s_step_coh_t : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> nat -> forall send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop, Transitions.send_step_t send_safe -> Prop
Transitions.SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
getSt_server : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> server_state
Record mixin_of (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet) : Prop := Mixin { _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d } Arguments Coherence.mixin_of _%function_scope Arguments Coherence.Mixin [nodes]%function_scope [coh] (_ _ _)%function_scope

apply r_step_coh_t.
intros d pf from this msg.
unfold rs_step.
destruct (this == server) eqn:E.
- apply getSt_server.
- apply getLocal.
Qed```
